title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Formative Conceptualization Modeling for Organizational Learning Structure Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of organizational management and learning theories, administrative/management work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the differences between organic and mechanical structures and explain their impact on organizational learning.
Learners can evaluate the effects of centralization and educational reinforcement on knowledge creation.
Learners can diagnose organizational design variables (specialization, standardization, etc.) using diagnostic tools and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
